sentences.en: A subdued impassioned murmur was audible in the room beyond.
sentences.cn: 可以听得见那边屋子里有一阵低低的、激动的交谈声.

sentences.en: Abroad, he was brisk and lively , and eager and impassioned enough.
sentences.cn: 在外边, 他朝气蓬勃,生龙活虎,也相当起劲,相当热情.

sentences.en: After three hours of impassioned debate the motion was defeated.
sentences.cn: 经过三小时激烈的辩论,这项动议被否决了.

sentences.en: He gave vent to his feelings in am impassioned speech.
sentences.cn: 在一次激动地演说中他毫无顾忌地吐露心声.

sentences.en: He give vent to his feelings in an impassioned speech.
He kept this impassioned doings a secret almost from himself.
sentences.cn: 他把他这种感情热烈的行动保守得极秘密,几乎连对自己都不泄露.

sentences.en: He made an impassioned appeal for peace.
Impassioned by genius. Inflamed by desire. Imprisoned by love.
sentences.cn: 慷慨激昂的天才. 发炎的愿望. 被囚禁的爱.

sentences.en: Once described as a dance of impassioned indifference, almost entirely tothe waist.
sentences.cn: 探戈一度被形容为缺乏热情和冷漠的舞蹈.

sentences.en: She appeared on television to make an impassioned plea for help.
sentences.cn: 她在电视上恳切地请求人们帮助。

sentences.en: She made an impassioned plea for help.
She wrote an impassioned letter to her local newspaper to complain about the new road.
sentences.cn: 她给当地的报纸写了一封措辞激烈的信,抱怨新修的马路.

sentences.en: So perhaps I was more impassioned than I need have been.
sentences.cn: 所以我可能太激动了一点.

sentences.en: The director of the charity made an impassioned plea for help.
sentences.cn: 慈善机构的负责人强烈请求帮助.

sentences.en: The general made an impassioned speech to his soldiers.
sentences.cn: 将军对士兵们作了慷慨激昂的演说.

sentences.en: What he sought was an impassioned realism, shot through with human aspirationfaith.
sentences.cn: 他追求的是一种冷静的现实主义, 充满了人类的理想和信念.

trans.tran_cn: 充满激情的，热烈的，感激的，慷慨激昂
trans.tran_en: full of strong feeling and emotion

trans.tran_cn: 使充满激情（impassion的过去式和过去分词）
